item.title: Cairnraiser add a quote by Juvenal
item.description: "Quis custodiet ipsos custodes? - Who will watch the watchers?" -- Juvenal

item.title: Cairnraiser add a quote by Stephen Crane
Cairnraiser add a quote by Andre Gide
item.description: "Believe those who are seeking the truth. Doubt those who find it." -- Andre Gide

item.title: Cairnraiser add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "The cure for boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Cairnraiser add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The fact that we live at the bottom of a deep gravity well, on the surface of a gas covered planet going around a nuclear fireball 90 million miles away and think this to be normal is obviously some indication of how skewed our perspective tends to be." -- Douglas Adams
